name: Old Man Consequences PLUS (The Shoodigity)
description:
THIS IS A NON PROFIT FANGAME!!!

Press C to catch the fish! (Or tap the fish on mobile) You have to be touching it! or y̴̡̻̩̜̳̭̰̼̳͓̺͎̹̯͐̃̍͐́̆̈́̇̀̍͌̋͆ó̵̢̧̫̩͕̗̝̗̳̘̞̯̣͈̌͑̓̀̏̈̀̎̚̚͠͝ͅu̶̮̯̼̼͔̦̣͇̟̦̩̇͜ͅ ̴̱͈͕̳͖̗̦̲̻̘̠̞̪̈́̓͒̔̏̏̚̕͜͝͠w̸̨̳̟̼̹̘͛̅͗̇̽͐̈́̏̾̓́̓͘͝i̸̧͎͍̟̬̩̳͚̥͈̩̟̿̉̋l̸̡͚̝̗̖̮̟̮̩͓̜͕̯͖͌̓̓͋̈ͅl̵͚̰̬͐̋͑̑̇ ̸̢̛͈͔̗̬̠͒̀̑̌̀͆̓d̴̛̟͓̦͇͖̝͍̣̝͙͎̮͐̓̇̇̆̏̓̏̓̎̍̄͜͜ͅḯ̵̥͓͈̟̟̎ͅẹ̵̢̨̡͔̘͉̤̦̥̜̏͐̆̔!!!!

It gets faster overtime, and it's ALL endless! Try to get the highest score out of anybody else!

But that's not all, there are random events and distractions that can hinder your performance. Make sure to solve them correctly or risk losing score!

Or if you're too lazy to play, (:skull:) you can press A to enable or disable Autoplay!

This is a remake of Old Man Consequence's mechanic from Ultimate Custom Night that’s been in development for almost a year. Old Man Consequences PLUS is filled to the brim with new content, easter eggs, new mechanics, and even an entire cloud system! It’s fully open source, and modding is encouraged! 

CREDITS:

Shoodigity (me) - Creator of OMC+

Scott Cawthon - Creator of FNaF

Micah McGonigal - Creator of Baldi’s Basics and some of the ambience used

Alex Kister - Creator of Mandela Catalogue

Krinkles - Creator of Madness Combat

Nintendo - Creator of some of the music used
